titleStmt.title: An Account of the conversation, behaviour and execution of William Anderton, printer who was condemned at the Old Baily, on Thursday the 8th of June, for high treason, and executed for the same, at Tybourn on Friday the 16th of June, 1693

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Wallis near the Green Dragon in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
